testcase.name: 80% Of Shown Products Should Be Exclusively The Searched Product

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Sum of the itens found are less than 80% at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at pages.PageAmazon.validateAtLeastOfItensFoundsAre(PageAmazon.java:62) at steps.SearchInAmazonSteps.makeSureAtLeastOfItemsFoundAre(SearchInAmazonSteps.java:45) at ✽.Then Make Sure At Least "80"% Of Items Found are "Iphone"(SearchInAmazon.feature:13)

testcase.failure:
Given Open Browser on "www.google.com"......................................passed And Search for "Amazon Brasil" and Search...................................passed And Navigate to "www.amazon.com.br" Through The Search Page.................passed And Search For "Iphone" Using The Search Bar................................passed And Count The Total List Of Found Products..................................passed And Count The Total Of "Iphone" Items Found.................................passed Then Make Sure At Least "80"% Of Items Found are "Iphone"...................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Sum of the itens found are less than 80% at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at pages.PageAmazon.validateAtLeastOfItensFoundsAre(PageAmazon.java:62) at steps.SearchInAmazonSteps.makeSureAtLeastOfItemsFoundAre(SearchInAmazonSteps.java:45) at ✽.Then Make Sure At Least "80"% Of Items Found are "Iphone"(SearchInAmazon.feature:13)

testcase.name: The Higher Price In The First Page Can't Be Greater Than U$2000

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: The converted value greater than U$2000 at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at pages.PageAmazon.validateTheValueIsLessThan(PageAmazon.java:94) at steps.SearchInAmazonSteps.makeSureTheConvertedValueIsNotGreaterThanUS(SearchInAmazonSteps.java:61) at ✽.Then Make Sure The Converted Value Is Not Greater Than US"2000"(SearchInAmazon.feature:19)
